# Physics Students Scientific Association of K. N. Toosi University (PSSA KNTU)

This association serves as a platform for scientific, research-based, and outreach activities in the field of Physics. By harnessing the collective efforts of student members and utilizing academic and external capacities, we aim to play a meaningful role in the broader scientific community.


## üéØ Our Goals

- Enhancing both general and specialized knowledge in various fields related to Physics.
- Promoting broad collaboration between the Physics Scientific Association and other academic societies to contribute to the development of the scientific community and the scholarly use of the Persian language.
- Conducting educational, research-based, and scientific programs‚Äîwhether directly in the field of / in areas related to Physics.
- Providing opportunities for collaboration among students, faculty members, and researchers.
- Raising awareness within the scientific community about available free and open-source tools, in order to foster a stronger culture of FOSS and shared knowledge.


## üìÅ Repositories

Here you can find our repositories with the following topics:

- üóÇÔ∏è LaTeX source code of our journals ‚Äî from templates to all published issues.
- üì¶ Packages and libraries developed within the association or in collaboration with partner academic groups and associations.
- üß† Notes and materials used in any of the association‚Äôs programs and events.
- üß© Research-based, educational, and promotional (with no similarity to marketing jurgen=]) projects in collaboration with students and faculty members.
